scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run start:prod || NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run start:dev
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd client && npm start"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
